transcript: you build a reputation by doing what you said and saying what you do and having both be true and this is the formula scoreboard what you've accomplished plus shots called what you say is going to happen and then making it happen equals your reputation so if you've done a lot of stuff and then you say stuff's going to happen and then you make it happen that's what builds a reputation it's the reason the greats like Muhammad Ali Floyd Mayweather Conor McGregor all of them like to call the shop because they know that if they hit it it builds the reputation even more than if they hadn't said it and did it anyways
